verses.verse: Now Moses <S%H4872><s%> kept <S%H1961><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> of Jethro <S%H3503><s%> his father in law <S%H2859><s%>, the priest <S%H3548><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%>: and he led <S%H5090><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> to the backside <S%H310><s%> of the desert <S%H4057><s%>, and came <S%H935><s%> to the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, even to Horeb <S%H2722><s%>.

And the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto him in a flame <S%H3827><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of a bush <S%H5572><s%>: and he looked <S%H7200><s%>, and <S%H5572><s%>, behold, the bush burned <S%H1197><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>, and the bush <S%H5572><s%> was not consumed <S%H398><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, I will now turn aside <S%H5493><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> sight <S%H4758><s%>, why <S%H4069><s%> the bush <S%H5572><s%> is not burnt <S%H1197><s%>.

And when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that he turned aside <S%H5493><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%>, God <S%H430><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> unto him out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the bush <S%H5572><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Moses <S%H4872><s%>. And he said <S%H559><s%>, Here am I.

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Draw not near <S%H7126><s%> here <S%H1988><s%>: put off <S%H5394><s%> your shoes <S%H5275><s%> from off your feet <S%H7272><s%>, for the place <S%H4725><s%> whereon <S%H834><s%> you stand <S%H5975><s%> is holy <S%H6944><s%> ground <S%H127><s%>.

Moreover he said <S%H559><s%>, I am the God <S%H430><s%> of your father <S%H1><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>. And Moses <S%H4872><s%> hid <S%H5641><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%>; for he was afraid <S%H3372><s%> to look <S%H5027><s%> upon God <S%H430><s%>.

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%>, I have surely <S%H7200><s%> seen <S%H7200><s%> the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> which are in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and have heard <S%H8085><s%> their cry <S%H6818><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of their taskmasters <S%H5065><s%>; for I know <S%H3045><s%> their sorrows <S%H4341><s%>;

And I am come down <S%H3381><s%> to deliver <S%H5337><s%> them out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>, and to bring <S%H5927><s%> them up out of that land <S%H776><s%> unto a good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> and a large <S%H7342><s%>, unto a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>; unto the place <S%H4725><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, and the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, and the Hivites <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>.

Now therefore <S%H6818><s%>, behold, the cry of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is come <S%H935><s%> unto me <S%H7200><s%>: and I have also seen the oppression <S%H3906><s%> with which the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> oppress them <S%H3905><s%>.

Come <S%H3212><s%> now therefore <S%H7971><s%>, and I will send you unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, that you may bring forth <S%H3318><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>, Who am I <S%H3212><s%>, that I should go unto Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>, and that I should bring forth <S%H3318><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>?

And he said <S%H559><s%>, Certainly I will be with you and this shall be a token <S%H226><s%> unto you that <S%H3588><s%> I have sent <S%H7971><s%> you When you have brought forth <S%H3318><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, you shall serve <S%H5647><s%> God <S%H430><s%> upon this mountain <S%H2022><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%>, Behold <S%H935><s%>, when I come unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and shall say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H430><s%>, The God of your fathers <S%H1><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me unto you <S%H559><s%>; and they shall say to me <S%H8034><s%>, What is his name? what shall I say unto them <S%H559><s%>?

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, I AM <S%H1961><s%> THAT I AM <S%H1961><s%>: and he said <S%H559><s%>, Thus shall you say <S%H559><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, I AM has sent me unto you <S%H7971><s%>.

And God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> moreover <S%H5750><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, Thus shall you say <S%H559><s%> unto the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, The Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and the God <S%H430><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, has sent <S%H7971><s%> me unto you <S%H8034><s%>: this is my name for ever <S%H5769><s%>, and this is my memorial <S%H2143><s%> unto all <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.

Go <S%H3212><s%>, and gather <S%H622><s%> the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> together <S%H622><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H3068><s%>, The Lord God <S%H430><s%> of your fathers <S%H1><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%>, of Isaac <S%H3327><s%>, and of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, appeared <S%H7200><s%> unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying, I have surely <S%H6485><s%> visited <S%H6485><s%> you <S%H6213><s%>, and seen that which is done to you in Egypt <S%H4714><s%>:

And I have said <S%H559><s%>, I will bring <S%H5927><s%> you up out of the affliction <S%H6040><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%>, and the Hittites <S%H2850><s%>, and the Amorites <S%H567><s%>, and the Perizzites <S%H6522><s%>, and the Hivites <S%H2340><s%>, and the Jebusites <S%H2983><s%>, unto a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey <S%H1706><s%>.

And they shall listen <S%H8085><s%> to your voice <S%H6963><s%>: and you shall come <S%H935><s%>, you and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, unto the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and you shall say <S%H559><s%> unto him <S%H3068><s%>, The Lord God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews <S%H5680><s%> has met <S%H7136><s%> with us <S%H3212><s%>: and now let us go, we beg you three <S%H7969><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>' journey <S%H1870><s%> into the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, that we may sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>.
And I am sure <S%H3045><s%> that the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will not let <S%H5414><s%> you go <S%H1980><s%>, no <S%H2389><s%>, not by a mighty hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And I will stretch out <S%H7971><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%>, and strike <S%H5221><s%> Egypt <S%H4714><s%> with all my wonders <S%H6381><s%> which I will do <S%H6213><s%> in the land <S%H7130><s%> there and after <S%H310><s%> that he will let you go <S%H7971><s%>.

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> this people <S%H5971><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>: and it shall come to pass <S%H3212><s%>, that, when you go, you shall not go <S%H3212><s%> empty <S%H7387><s%>:

But every woman <S%H802><s%> shall borrow <S%H7592><s%> of her neighbor <S%H7934><s%>, and of her that stays <S%H1481><s%> in her house <S%H1004><s%>, jewels <S%H3627><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and jewels <S%H3627><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>, and clothes <S%H8071><s%>: and you shall put <S%H7760><s%> them upon your sons <S%H1121><s%>, and upon your daughters <S%H1323><s%>; and you shall plunder <S%H5337><s%> the Egyptians <S%H4714><s%>.
